nodes.text: The Comet Run Day Battle was a battle between the Tusken Raiders and the Settler's Call group

The Tusken Raiders attacked Dannar's Claim during the Comet Run while most of the settlers were away. Obi-Wan Kenobi and Annie Calwell held off the Tuskens until all the settlers arrived. Wyle Ulbreck and secretly Obi-Wan Kenobi held off the Tuskens until their retreat.
The settlers then returned from Comet Run. The settlers pursued and massacred the retreating Tuskens at Hanter's Gorge.
The people of Dannar's Claim had to regroup and the Tusken Raiders had to retreat with massive casualties
